title: Focus on merit, not political pressure: USC president on rejection of Trump administration’s White House compact
description: Kim discusses sustaining USC's long standing relationship with Indian students, their current anxieties, layoffs, Artificial Intelligence in classrooms, and why he believes universities must remain places where difficult conversations are not avoided but encouraged.
content:

title: HCLSoftware to acquire business intelligence platform Jaspersoft for $240 million
description: HCLSoftware is set to acquire Jaspersoft for a hefty sum of $240 million. With this acquisition, HCLSoftware will welcome 115 new team members into its fold. This expansion aims to significantly strengthen HCLSoftware's offerings in data and artificial intelligence.

title: AI Traffic Cameras Expose Chaos: 1,000 Violations at One Junction in Four Days
description: A pilot deployment of artificial intelligence traffic cameras in Attica has exposed rampant driving violations, with a single unit on Syngrou Avenue recording over 1,000 cases of mobile phone use and seatbelt infractions in just 96 hours.

title: Elon Musk Backs Demis Hassabis In Dispute With Meta's Yann LeCun Over 'General Intelligence,' Says Google DeepMind CEO Is 'Right'
description: Elon Musk backed Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis in a public dispute with Meta's outgoing AI chief Yann LeCun over whether artificial general intelligence is real, highlighting deep divisions among top AI leaders about how intelligence should be defined and when AGI might arrive.
content: On Monday, Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) CEO Elon Musk weighed in on an AI debate, siding with Alphabet Inc.'s (NASDAQ:GOOG) (NASDAQ:GOOGL) Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis after Meta Platforms, Inc.'s (NASDAQ:META) outgoing AI chief Yann LeCun dismisse... [3193 chars]

title: US visa curbs, AI surge shape cautious outlook for Indian IT in 2026
description: As India’s IT sector, valued at $280 billion, navigates its way toward 2026, it faces significant challenges such as stringent visa regulations and mounting global trade pressures. In response, businesses are pouring resources into artificial intelligence and developing global capability centers to enhance their international presence.

title: The Pentagon and AI giants have a weakness. Both need China's batteries, badly.
description: As the United States revs up its artificial intelligence sector and military capabilities, a concerning dependency on Chinese-made batteries emerges. This reliance threatens national security, prompting the government to shift focus toward bolstering local battery manufacturing.
